roleset.name: vain

role.descr: trait that arg1 is vain about

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7.

example.text: Li Chengfu , one of the bullies , was extremely conceited and claimed , " I am a Secretary of the Committee for Discipline Inspection -- I do not fear anyone and am not afraid to kill you . "
example.arg: Li Chengfu, one of the bullies
